name: Limbo Train
description:
Just let me stay above these tracks a while longer...

This space that carries my thoughts and my feelings, spreading them over hills, forests and cities as they flow with the landscape, as I search and collect my dreams, hopes, ideas and fears...

Just let this journey last a while longer...

Press/hold Right.

Game data available here: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_wDEC2vxK3tLUVWLThhQm1pdnc
